home.title: PredomicsApp
home.subtitle: Discover sparse, interpretable predictive models from omics data.
home.description: Powered by gpredomics — a high-performance Rust engine for Binary, Ternary, and Ratio model languages using genetic algorithms, beam search, and Bayesian MCMC.
home.uploadDataDesc: Import your omics/metagenomics matrices (TSV/CSV) with flexible row or column orientation.
home.configureRunDesc: Choose algorithms (GA, Beam, MCMC), languages (binary, ternary, ratio), and tune parameters.
home.exploreResultsDesc: Browse model populations, inspect feature importance, and compare across runs.
home.externalValidationDesc: Score new samples against trained models. Upload an independent cohort and get AUC, accuracy, and per-sample predictions.
home.predictionApiDesc: Deploy models as JSON endpoints. Send feature data via curl or code and receive class predictions in real time.
home.pdfReportsDesc: Download publication-ready biomarker reports with performance metrics, feature tables, and configuration summaries.
home.dashboardOverviewDesc: Global overview with running jobs, recent completions, dataset counts, and activity feed across all your projects.
home.projectNotesDesc: Threaded discussion per project. Add notes, track decisions, and collaborate with your team.
home.publicSharingDesc: Generate read-only links to share results with anyone — no login required. Set expiry or revoke anytime.

login.title: PredomicsApp
login.subtitle: Microbiome-based classification
login.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

projects.title: Projects
projects.selectProjectMsg: Choose a project from the list or create a new one to get started.
projects.deleteConfirm: Delete project "{name}"? This cannot be undone.

meta.title: Multi-Cohort Meta-Analysis
meta.subtitle: Compare models trained on different datasets to identify shared biomarkers and assess cross-cohort consistency.
meta.searchPlaceholder: Search jobs by project or job name...
meta.featureOverlapDesc: Features shared across cohorts are more likely to be robust biomarkers.
